thread.title: #MeToo picks up in South Korea as politician resigns

title: #MeToo picks up in South Korea as politician resigns
text:
#MeToo picks up in South Korea as politician resigns 5:59am EST - 01:12 
South Korea's snowballing #MeToo movement has swept into the country's political establishment and brought down one of it's rising stars, Governor An Hee-Jung. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
